trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event occurs when the currently selected date or range of dates changes; for example, when the user explicitly changes a selection within the current month or when the selection is implicitly changed in response to next/previous month navigation.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> event occurs when the user explicitly changes a selection.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor specifies the start and end for the new date range that has been selected.
> [!NOTE] > If a single date is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> property values will be equal.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> property values are set by the `start` and `end` parameter values of this constructor.
The first date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
The last date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
Gets the last date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last date in the date range that the user has selected.
Gets the first date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the first date in the date range that the user has selected.
